sourcesContent: import{__awaiter as t}from"tslib";import{Hub as i,DataStore as o}from"aws-amplify";import{UI_CHANNEL as e,ACTION_DATASTORE_DELETE_STARTED as s,EVENT_ACTION_DATASTORE_DELETE as r,ACTION_DATASTORE_DELETE_FINISHED as d}from"./constants.js";import{getErrorMessage as a}from"../../helpers/utils.js";import{AMPLIFY_SYMBOL as m}from"../../helpers/constants.js";const p=({model:p,id:n})=>()=>t(void 0,void 0,void 0,(function*(){try{i.dispatch(e,{event:s,data:{id:n}},r,m),yield o.delete(p,n),i.dispatch(e,{event:d,data:{id:n}},r,m)}catch(t){i.dispatch(e,{event:d,data:{id:n,errorMessage:a(t)}},r,m)}}));export{p as useDataStoreDeleteAction};
